test_cases.test_name: Verify clean installation of custom application binaries
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the custom application and all prerequisite components install correctly on a qualified operating system image without errors.

test_steps.action: Launch the installer using documented procedure IQ-INS-001.
test_steps.expected_result: Installer wizard starts and displays correct application name and version.

test_steps.action: Accept license, select default installation path, and proceed.
test_steps.expected_result: No validation errors; disk space check passes.

test_steps.action: Complete installation and review generated log file.
test_steps.expected_result: Log file shows 0 errors and 0 warnings.

acceptance_criteria: Log file recorded and stored in configuration management system
data_integrity_requirements: Installation logs must be attributable and contemporaneous (ALCOA+)

test_cases.test_name: Validate application build number and configuration baseline
test_cases.objective: Ensure that the deployed application build and configuration files match the approved baseline in version control.

test_steps.action: Retrieve build number from application about dialog.
test_steps.expected_result: Displayed build matches approved release document.

test_steps.action: Generate checksum of core executable and compare to repository hash.
Verify configuration files against baseline using automated diff tool.

acceptance_criteria: Build number and checksums match baseline
data_integrity_requirements: Build artifacts must be legible and original records retained (ALCOA+)

test_cases.test_name: Confirm third-party library installation and validation status
test_cases.objective: Verify that all third-party and open-source libraries are installed at validated versions and digitally signed where applicable.

test_steps.action: Run SBOM scanner to list installed libraries and versions.
test_steps.expected_result: Report lists all libraries with expected versions.

test_steps.action: Cross-check digital signatures of critical libraries.
test_steps.expected_result: Signatures verified against trusted certificate authority.

test_steps.action: Document any discrepancies and raise deviation if found.

acceptance_criteria: All libraries present at validated versions
data_integrity_requirements: SBOM report stored in immutable repository (ALCOA+)

test_cases.test_name: Validate user authentication and basic login workflow
test_cases.objective: Ensure that only authorized users can log in and system accurately records authentication events in audit trail.

test_steps.action: Attempt login with valid Analyst credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in; role displayed as Analyst.

test_steps.action: Attempt login with invalid password.
test_steps.expected_result: Login fails; system displays error message and records failed attempt.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail for both events.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail shows accurate, immutable, time-stamped entries.

data_integrity_requirements: Authentication records must be attributable and time-stamped

test_cases.test_name: Verify role-based access control for restricted functions
test_cases.objective: Confirm that each user role can access only permitted menus and functions as defined in the requirement specification.

test_steps.action: Login as Analyst and attempt to approve results.
test_steps.expected_result: System denies access and logs attempt.

test_steps.action: Login as QA Approver and approve a pending result.
test_steps.expected_result: Approval succeeds and electronic signature dialog appears.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail for both actions.
test_steps.expected_result: Entries accurately reflect user, role, action, and timestamp.

data_integrity_requirements: Access control events must be contemporaneous

test_cases.test_name: Electronic signature capture and verification for approvals
test_cases.objective: Validate that electronic signatures are uniquely linked to an individual and require password re-entry per 21 CFR Part 11.

test_steps.action: QA Approver signs a result; system prompts for password.
test_steps.expected_result: Signature recorded after correct password entry only.

test_steps.action: Attempt signature with incorrect password.
Verify signature details in database back-end.
test_steps.expected_result: Record contains signer name, meaning, date/time and reason.

data_integrity_requirements: Signature data must be attributable, legible, and enduring

test_cases.test_name: Sample registration workflow end-to-end functional test
test_cases.objective: Ensure sample registration captures all URS-specified attributes and generates correct unique IDs.

test_steps.action: Register new sample with valid batch number, manufacture date, expiry date auto-calc.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample saved and sample ID generated.

test_steps.action: Attempt registration with invalid batch number length.
test_steps.expected_result: System blocks entry and prompts correction.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail entries for both attempts.
test_steps.expected_result: Two entries recorded with correct status.

data_integrity_requirements: Sample data must be complete and accurate

test_cases.test_name: Stability study protocol creation and approval workflow
test_cases.objective: Validate that stability study protocols can be configured, routed for approval, and locked against further changes post approval.

test_steps.action: Create new stability protocol with required points.
Route protocol to Reviewer for electronic sign-off.
Complete QA approval.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to Approved and fields become read-only.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol progresses through workflow states correctly
data_integrity_requirements: Protocol metadata must be enduring and complete

test_cases.test_name: Custom Out-of-Specification (OOS) business rule verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm the custom scripted logic correctly flags results as OOS and triggers investigation workflow.
prerequisites: Test analyte with limit values prepared

test_steps.action: Enter test result within specification.
Enter test result outside specification.
test_steps.expected_result: System flags OOS and opens investigation record automatically.

test_steps.action: Review investigation record links to sample.

data_integrity_requirements: OOS flag must be accurate and attributable

test_cases.test_name: Electronic worksheet calculation and rounding verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that electronic worksheets perform calculations using validated formulas and correct rounding rules.

test_steps.action: Populate worksheet with reference data set A.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated results match reference to 4 decimal places.

test_steps.action: Populate worksheet with data set triggering rounding edge case.
Export worksheet to PDF and verify values unchanged.

data_integrity_requirements: Calculation logic must be accurate and verifiable

test_cases.test_name: Audit trail generation, review, and export functionality
test_cases.objective: Validate that every create, modify, and delete action is recorded with required metadata and that audit reports are tamper-evident.

test_steps.action: Perform create, modify, delete actions on a test record.
Export audit trail to CSV and verify checksum.
Attempt manual edit of exported file and re-validate checksum.
test_steps.expected_result: Checksum mismatch detected, export flagged as altered.

data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must be attributable, complete, and immutable

test_cases.test_name: Alert notification and escalation workflow verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure real-time alerts are sent to correct recipients and escalated if not acknowledged within SLA.

test_steps.action: Generate an OOS event to trigger alert.
test_steps.expected_result: Primary email alert sent to Analyst.

test_steps.action: Do not acknowledge alert for 30 minutes.
Confirm both alerts logged in system notification history.
test_steps.expected_result: Notification history shows timestamps and recipients.

data_integrity_requirements: Alert records must be contemporaneous

test_cases.test_name: Automated data archival and retention rule validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that data older than seven years is automatically archived to long-term storage while remaining retrievable and intact.
prerequisites: Test dataset older than 7 years loaded

test_steps.action: Execute scheduled archival job manually.
test_steps.expected_result: Eligible records transferred to archive database.

test_steps.action: Retrieve a random archived record.
test_steps.expected_result: Record available and identical to pre-archive snapshot.

test_steps.action: Verify original database no longer contains archived record.

data_integrity_requirements: Archived data must be enduring and available throughout retention period

test_cases.test_name: Algorithm verification for expiry date calculation logic
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom algorithm accurately calculates expiry dates based on manufacturing date and product master data across boundary conditions.

test_steps.action: Enter manufacturing date 2024-01-31 for product with 12-month shelf life.
Enter leap-year date 2024-02-29 with 24-month shelf life.
test_steps.expected_result: Expiry calculated as 2026-02-28 per business rule.

test_steps.action: Compare all calculated dates to independently computed values.

data_integrity_requirements: Algorithm outputs must be accurate and traceable

test_cases.test_name: Boundary testing of temperature range input validation
test_cases.objective: Ensure system correctly handles minimum, maximum, and out-of-range temperature inputs defined in URS-EMS-004.

test_steps.action: Input minimum valid value -80°C.
Input maximum valid value 50°C.
Input out-of-range value 60°C.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects value with validation message.

data_integrity_requirements: Input validation ensures data accuracy

test_cases.test_name: SAP ERP interface data exchange verification
test_cases.objective: Verify bidirectional data transfer between LIMS and SAP using vendor adapter with correct field mapping and error handling.

test_steps.action: Send sample release status from LIMS to SAP.
test_steps.expected_result: SAP receives and updates batch status.

test_steps.action: Update material master in SAP and trigger sync to LIMS.
Introduce network interruption and resend message.
test_steps.expected_result: Message queued and resent automatically after link restored.

data_integrity_requirements: Interface ensures complete and accurate transfer

test_cases.test_name: Instrument interface real-time data acquisition verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm instrument driver captures raw data in real time and passes checksum verified files to LIMS without alteration.

test_steps.action: Run test measurement and capture raw file.
test_steps.expected_result: Raw data file generated with checksum.

test_steps.action: System auto-imports data into LIMS.
Compare imported result to original raw data.

data_integrity_requirements: Raw data must remain original and complete

test_cases.test_name: Middleware messaging error handling and recovery test
test_cases.objective: Assess middleware’s ability to detect, log, and recover from message corruption between subsystems.

test_steps.action: Inject deliberately corrupted XML message.
test_steps.expected_result: Middleware rejects message and logs error.

test_steps.action: Resend corrected message.
Verify downstream system data consistency.
test_steps.expected_result: No partial data persisted from corrupt message.

data_integrity_requirements: Error handling must prevent incomplete data states

test_cases.test_name: End-to-end batch release report generation and delivery
test_cases.objective: Validate complete workflow from sample login through test completion to automatic batch release report sent to SAP.

test_steps.action: Process sample through full testing cycle.
test_steps.expected_result: All results approved and status set to Released.

test_steps.action: Generate batch release report automatically.
Confirm report posted to SAP and archived in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: SAP document link and LIMS archive entry present.

data_integrity_requirements: Report must be complete, original, and archived

test_cases.test_name: Concurrent user load test at 100 simultaneous sessions
test_cases.objective: Verify application maintains acceptable response times with 100 concurrent authenticated users performing typical actions.

test_steps.action: Ramp up virtual users to 100 over 10 minutes executing login and query transactions.
Maintain load for 30 minutes.
Ramp down and review server logs.

acceptance_criteria: Response time, error rate, and CPU within limits
data_integrity_requirements: Performance logs must be accurate and retained

test_cases.test_name: Stress test large dataset import of 1 million records
test_cases.objective: Assess system ability to import 1 million historical records without data loss or performance degradation.

test_steps.action: Execute bulk import process.
test_steps.expected_result: Import completes within 2 hours with 0 errors.

test_steps.action: Run validation query for record count.
Monitor system resources during import.

data_integrity_requirements: Imported data must be complete and accurate

test_cases.test_name: Peak usage response time monitoring during scheduled maintenance
test_cases.objective: Validate that scheduled maintenance activities do not impact response time beyond 5 seconds for active users.

test_steps.action: Start maintenance job while 50 users active.
Monitor error logs.

data_integrity_requirements: Monitoring data must be complete

test_cases.test_name: Database throughput benchmark under peak analytical run
test_cases.objective: Measure database transactions per second during simulated peak analytical run and confirm meets SLA.

test_steps.action: Execute workload script for 15 minutes.
Capture database wait statistics.
test_steps.expected_result: No wait type exceeds 30% of total time.

data_integrity_requirements: Benchmark results stored unaltered

test_cases.test_name: Password policy enforcement and complexity rules
test_cases.objective: Verify system enforces password length, complexity, reuse, and expiration policies per SOP and 21 CFR Part 11 guidance.

test_steps.action: Attempt to set password 'test'.
Set compliant password and attempt reuse after change.
Attempt login after password expiry period.

data_integrity_requirements: Credential events must be recorded and immutable

test_cases.test_name: Role escalation and privilege abuse penetration test
test_cases.objective: Attempt unauthorized role escalation via application and database to ensure privilege separation is enforced.

test_steps.action: Execute SQL injection attempt to modify role table.
test_steps.expected_result: Database rejects change; no privilege escalation.

test_steps.action: Attempt to assign QA role via API without token.

acceptance_criteria: All escalation attempts blocked and logged
data_integrity_requirements: Security logs must be complete and original

test_cases.test_name: Session timeout and automatic re-authentication verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm session automatically logs out after configured inactivity period and requires full credential re-entry.

test_steps.action: Login and remain idle for 16 minutes.
Attempt restricted action via back button.

data_integrity_requirements: Session handling prevents unauthorized access

test_cases.test_name: SQL injection and input sanitization verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure all input fields are sanitized to prevent SQL injection vulnerabilities across the application.
prerequisites: Web application firewall disabled for test

test_steps.action: Submit malicious input 'OR 1=1' into search field.
test_steps.expected_result: System treats input as literal string; query not modified.

test_steps.action: Review application logs for errors.
test_steps.expected_result: No SQL errors or stack traces exposed.

data_integrity_requirements: Input validation maintains data integrity

test_cases.test_name: Audit trail tampering detection and alerting
test_cases.objective: Demonstrate that any attempted modification of audit trail data is detected and triggers alert per policy.
prerequisites: Admin account with limited DB access

test_steps.action: Attempt direct DB update to audit table using admin account.
test_steps.expected_result: Update rejected by DB trigger; event logged.

test_steps.action: Review alert dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Tampering alert displayed and email sent.

data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must be immutable and tamper evident

test_cases.test_name: System time synchronization and timestamp accuracy test
test_cases.objective: Verify application timestamps align with NTP server within ±2 seconds ensuring chronological order of records.

test_steps.action: Capture system time and NTP time.
Create test record and verify timestamp in DB.

data_integrity_requirements: Accurate time is critical for ALCOA+

test_cases.test_name: Backup and restore process data integrity verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that backup and restore processes maintain data integrity, audit trails, and electronic signatures.

test_steps.action: Execute full system backup and record completion log.
Restore backup to validation environment.
Perform checksum comparison of key tables vs. pre-backup snapshot.

data_integrity_requirements: Backups must be complete, consistent, and verifiable
